GSD.description:
scsi: myrs: Fix crash in error case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 6207f35c213f6cb2fc3f13b5e77f08c710e1de19. For more details please see the references link.
